metadata.title: CVE-2020-13092 on Ubuntu 21.10 (impish) - negligible.
metadata.description: ** DISPUTED ** scikit-learn (aka sklearn) through 0.23.0 can unserialize and execute commands from an untrusted file that is passed to the joblib.load() function, if __reduce__ makes an os.system call. NOTE: third parties dispute this issue because the joblib.load() function is documented as unsafe and it is the user's responsibility to use the function in a secure manner.

criterions.comment: scikit-learn package in impish is affected and may need fixing.
